mapper.insert: insert into admin (AdminID, AdminName, AdminSex, UserID, AdminType, AdminChina, AdminSite, AdminPwd, AdminTEL, AdminNotes) values (#{adminid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{adminname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{adminsex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{admintype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{adminchina,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{adminsite,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{adminpwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{admintel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{adminnotes,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update admin set AdminName = #{adminname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AdminSex = #{adminsex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, UserID = #{userid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AdminType = #{admintype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, AdminChina = #{adminchina,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AdminSite = #{adminsite,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AdminPwd = #{adminpwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AdminTEL = #{admintel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AdminNotes = #{adminnotes,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where AdminID = #{adminid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select AdminID, AdminName, AdminSex, UserID, AdminType, AdminChina, AdminSite, AdminPwd, AdminTEL, AdminNotes from admin where AdminID = #{adminid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select AdminID, AdminName, AdminSex, UserID, AdminType, AdminChina, AdminSite, AdminPwd, AdminTEL, AdminNotes from admin
